verses.verse: And I <S%G1492>saw<s%> in the <S%G1188>right<s%> hand of him that <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> a <S%G975>book<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G2081>within<s%> and <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G3693>backside,<s%> <S%G2696>sealed<s%> with <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4973>seals.<s%>

And I <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G2478>strong<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2784>proclaiming<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> is <S%G514>worthy<s%> to <S%G455>open<s%> the <S%G975>book,<s%> and to <S%G3089>loose<s%> the <S%G4973>seals<s%> <S%G846>thereof?<s%>

And <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> in <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G5270>under<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> was <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G455>open<s%> the <S%G975>book,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> to <S%G991>look<s%> <S%G846>thereon.<s%>

And I <S%G2799>wept<s%> <S%G4183>much,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> was <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> to <S%G455>open<s%> and to <S%G314>read<s%> the <S%G975>book,<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> to <S%G991>look<s%> <S%G846>thereon.<s%>

And <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to me, <S%G2799>Weep<s%> not: <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G3023>Lion<s%> of the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G2455>Juda,<s%> the <S%G4491>Root<s%> of <S%G1138>David,<s%> has <S%G3528>prevailed<s%> to <S%G455>open<s%> the <S%G975>book,<s%> and to <S%G3089>loose<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4973>seals<s%> <S%G846>thereof.<s%>

And I <S%G1492>beheld,<s%> and, <S%G2400>see,<s%> in the <S%G3319>middle<s%> of the <S%G2362>throne<s%> and of the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2226>beasts,<s%> and in the <S%G3319>middle<s%> of the <S%G4245>elders,<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> a <S%G721>Lamb<s%> as it had been <S%G4969>slain,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2768>horns<s%> and <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> are the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4151>Spirits<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G649>forth<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>
And he <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G4327>took<s%> the <S%G975>book<s%> out of the <S%G1188>right<s%> hand of him that <S%G2521>sat<s%> on the <S%G2362>throne.<s%>

And <S%G3753>when<s%> he had <S%G2983>taken<s%> the <S%G975>book,<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2226>beasts<s%> and <S%G5064>four<s%> and <S%G1501>twenty<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> down <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G721>Lamb,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> one of them <S%G2788>harps,<s%> and <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G5357>vials<s%> <S%G1073>full<s%> of <S%G2368>odors,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> are the <S%G4335>prayers<s%> of <S%G40>saints.<s%>

And they <S%G103>sung<s%> a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G5603>song,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> You <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> to <S%G2983>take<s%> the <S%G975>book,<s%> and to <S%G455>open<s%> the <S%G4973>seals<s%> <S%G846>thereof:<s%> for you were <S%G4969>slain,<s%> and have <S%G59>redeemed<s%> us to <S%G2316>God<s%> by your <S%G129>blood<s%> out of <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5443>kindred,<s%> and <S%G1100>tongue,<s%> and <S%G2992>people,<s%> and <S%G1484>nation;<s%>
And have <S%G4160>made<s%> us to our <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G935>kings<s%> and <S%G2409>priests:<s%> and we shall <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

And I <S%G1492>beheld,<s%> and I <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2943>round<s%> <S%G2943>about<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> and the <S%G2226>beasts<s%> and the <S%G4245>elders:<s%> and the <S%G706>number<s%> of them was <S%G3461>ten<s%> <S%G3461>thousand<s%> times <S%G3461>ten<s%> <S%G3461>thousand,<s%> and <S%G5505>thousands<s%> of <S%G5505>thousands;<s%>

<S%G3004>Saying<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G514>Worthy<s%> is the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> that was <S%G4969>slain<s%> to <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1411>power,<s%> and <S%G4149>riches,<s%> and <S%G4678>wisdom,<s%> and <S%G2479>strength,<s%> and <S%G5092>honor,<s%> and <S%G1391>glory,<s%> and <S%G2129>blessing.<s%>

And <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2938>creature<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> and <S%G5270>under<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> and such as are in the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> that are in them, <S%G191>heard<s%> I <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2129>Blessing,<s%> and <S%G5092>honor,<s%> and <S%G1391>glory,<s%> and <S%G2904>power,<s%> be to him that <S%G2521>sits<s%> on the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> and to the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> for <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%>

And the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2226>beasts<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%> And the <S%G5064>four<s%> and <S%G1501>twenty<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> down and <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> him that <S%G2198>lives<s%> for <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%>
